alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Clearwater; Lake of the Woods; Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 10:19AM CDT until June 24 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CDT FOR EASTERN POLK...CENTRAL BELTRAMI...SOUTH CENTRAL LAKE OF THE WOODS AND NORTHERN CLEARWATER COUNTIES... At 1018 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Oaks Corner to Red Lake Nation to Weme, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bagley, Redby, Clearbrook, Red Lake, Lower Red Lake, Ponemah and Gonvick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Beltrami; Clearwater; Lake of the Woods; Polk
